dict.acceptation: （个人）环境的，由个人环境产生的，周围的；环境艺术的；

sent.orig: Agricultural sectors supervise agro-environmental protection work, and environmental protection sectors are for rural ecological environmental protection.
sent.trans: 农业部门依法对农业环境保护工作实施监督管理，环境保护部门负责农村生态环境保护。

sent.orig: Environmental environmental protection business unit, Feidahuanbao, environmental protection, high net-long finishing strong.
sent.trans: 环保股创业环保、菲达环保、龙净环保等高位强势整理。

sent.orig: Students' environmental knowledge, environmental attitude, and environmental behavioral intention are positively correlated.
sent.trans: 学童的环境知识，环境态度与环境行为意向三者之间均呈正相关。

sent.orig: But at present, most farmers have less environmental knowledge, environmental awareness and environmental sanitation.
sent.trans: 但目前大部分农民环境知识匮乏、环境意识不强、环境行为落后。

sent.orig: Environmental protection; Environmental protection advertisement; The Environmental Protection Theory; Ad Value Theory; Development Strategies.
sent.trans: 环保；环保广告；环境保护理论；广告价值理论；发展对策。
